# D2 Wishlists

## Beyond Light & Season of the Hunt (S12)

### Kinetic
#### HAILING CONFUSION
// notes: PVE - You can almost get this on par with Bygones. MW-Range MOD-Counterbalance Stock
dimwishlist:item=2870169846&perks=1482024992,1885400500,3436462433,3592538738
